message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $14000, which is a competitive offer considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. I would like to propose a price of $13000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $13500. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in discussion, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for the product's value. Considering your last offer, I'm willing to meet you at $13000, but I can do $13250 if you're willing to meet me halfway again.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $12750 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to reach a deal. I can offer the product to you for $13500, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm hoping we can wrap up the deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $13000 for the product.

I'm not willing to accept $13000, Bob. I believe the product is worth more to you than that. I'm willing to meet you at $13750, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. This is my last offer, and I expect a serious response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $13500 for the product.
